titles: S. Augustines manuel Conteining special, and piked meditations, and godlie praiers: drawne out of the Word of God, and writings of the holie Fathers, for the exercise of the soule. Corrected, translated, and adorned, by Thomas Rogers.
author: Augustine, Saint, Bishop of Hippo.
Rogers, Thomas, d. 1616.
publisher: By Henrie Denham, dwelling in Pater noster rowe, at the signe of the Starre. Cum priuilegio Regiæ Maiestatis,
notes: Probably not in fact by Augustine.
Cf. Folger catalogue, which gives signatures A-E¹² .
Reproduction of the original in the Henry E. Huntington Library and Art Gallery.
keywords: Christian life --  Catholic authors --  Early works to 1800.
